message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want a larger share, so I'm offering a bit more than a 50/50 split.  Let's close this deal and avoid further losses to inflation.
I see you're willing to compromise, let's meet closer to the middle.
This is a significant compromise on my part, Alice. Every round costs us both. Let's be reasonable and finalize this deal.
